history.narrative: Law 3-138, the “Financial Management Responsibility Act of 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-303 which was referred to the Committee on Government Operation and the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 29, 1980 and September 16, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 2, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-259 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
